name: xpath-generator
description: A modern, web-based application that extracts XPaths of all interactive elements from any given URL. Perfect for web automation, testing, and scraping projects.

scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run optimize
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.test:build: npm run build && echo 'Build test passed'
scripts.test:lighthouse: npm run start & timeout 10 && npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-report.html --chrome-flags='--headless' --no-enable-error-reporting
scripts.preview: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 8080 -o
scripts.deploy:github: npm run build && npx gh-pages -d dist
scripts.deploy:netlify: npm run build && npx netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q dist 2>nul || rm -rf dist/ && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || rm -rf node_modules/ && rmdir /s /q .lighthouseci 2>nul || rm -rf .lighthouseci/

author: XPath Generator Team
